content:
Did a lot of kamikaze coding and got an annexe (correction state) for the en version of the manual.
https://opencpn-manuals.github.io/inland-ecdis/manuals/en/index.html
Need to get the annexe into the nl, fr, de versions:
https://github.com/opencpn-manuals/inland-ecdis/issues/1
Need some loops but I am not sure how to go about this. Ideas?

Hm... you have been busy ;)

Where can I find source_list.js?

src-list.js is here:
https://github.com/opencpn-manuals/inland-ecdis
The docs are in a separate repo:
https://github.com/opencpn-manuals/inland-ecdis-docs
Some massive help from the translators.

hm... Did I actually work with this code? Seems like a very long time since...

Anyway, I think think the trick might be to refactor onContentAggregated to a separate function with yet another parameter, and then let onContentAggregated just call this function with correct args four times.

Just my 5 Ã¶re...

Shamelessly plagiarized. I think you may have been here:
https://gist.github.com/danyill/b050f04258b12967b47a8f2156caf5b3

No, I'm not involved. Anyway, looks like he knows what he is doing, should be fine to use. Good finding!

The code is not particularly hard to write. The problem is the lack of documentation, sort of a disgrace for the Antora project. It's on their TODO.

Sorry for late reply, extremely busy with the comm thing.
